solution_line_template: Nathan added {total_blankets_in_closet} / {half_divisor} = <<{total_blankets_in_closet}/{half_divisor}={blankets_added}>>{blankets_added} blankets to his bed.
The blankets warmed Nathan up {blankets_added} * {degrees_per_blanket} = <<{blankets_added}*{degrees_per_blanket}={total_degrees_warmed}>>{total_degrees_warmed} degrees.
